// Companion file for keyguard openings
// This file must be included by the main SCAD file

screen_openings=[

[    1,   10,    10,    30,     40,   "r",        90,           90,         90,          90,             3,      ],
[    2,   50,    10,    30,     40,   "r",        90,           90,         90,          90,             3,      ],
];

case_openings=[
[    1,    0,     0,     0,      0,   "r",        90,           90,         90,          90,             0,      ],
];

];

];
